Configuring advanced services in Windows Server is an integral skill for any Windows network admin. This means DHCP and DNS solutions, VPNs, direct access, and IP address management (IPAM)â€”complex topics that form the core of two Windows Server exams: Configuring Windows Server (70-411) and Configuring Advanced Windows Server Services (70-412).â€¨â€¨This Windows training course helps you study for the exams while learning advanced server administration techniques.
